nodes.text: The Saak'ak was a modified Lucrehulk-class LH-3210 cargo freighter and the flagship of the Trade Federation during the Invasion of Naboo. Captained by Daultay Dofine, it orbited the planet Naboo throughout the invasion. After the occupation was complete, it left the system while its commanders were transferred to the Droid Control Ship Vuutun Palaa.

During the blockade of Naboo, the Saak'ak was visited by two Jedi Knights named Qui-Gon Jinn and Obi-Wan Kenobi, ambassadors representing the Galactic Republic's Supreme Chancellor Valorum. Darth Sidious ordered the Jedi's death, and Viceroy Nute Gunray looked to carry this order out using poison gas and a number of battle droids. The Jedi escaped the ambush and fled the ship after being cornered by two destroyer droids.
